author: admin
title: Global Flash Memory Cards Market 2015-2019 - Reportlinker Review
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/28/2015 @ 2:20 PM Companies mentioned in this article: ReportLinker 
NEW YORK, Sept. 28, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- About flash memory cardMemory cards, also known as flash memory cards, are storage devices commonly used in cell phones, MP3 players, digital cameras, digital camcorders, tablets, gaming consoles, PDAs, and printers. They have non-volatile memory that can be reprogrammed multiple times in the course of their lifecycle. High density storage capability, quick read and write cycle, and small size have improved their adoption in the digital domain. Also, optimization of technology and the increasing demand for high capacity portable memory among consumers have resulted in the popularity of these cards in the market.Technavio's analysts forecast the global flash memory card market to grow at a CAGR of 4.4% over the period 2014-2019. Covered in this Report The report covers the present scenario and the growth prospects of the global flash memory card for the period 2015-2019. The market has been segmented and sub-segmented on the following basis:By end-user application
